pr4.vehicles

Interface IVehicle

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Car, Motorcycle, Truck, Vehicle

    public interface IVehicle
    Interface to define a vehicle.
    Author:
    Kevin de la Coba and Marcos Bernuy.
